node.description: Circular and featuring just the right compliment of shadows to light, comfortable seats, padded with blue velvet upholstery that features the signature black rose motif of Milene's, await those who enter here. The soft perfume of flowers drifts through the air, and a crisp midnight blue cloth of thick linen covers the tabletop.

node.name: Brickwell Tower, The Crystal Sparrow
node.description: Set up by the Trader's Guild, the Crystal Sparrow is a small inn for those who are too busy with Guild business, or too tired from their travels, to visit one of the city's many finer establishments. The stone walls of the room have been covered by cherrywood paneling carved with various images in sylvan theme. A small crystal sparrow sits on display in a golden cage hung from the center of the ceiling. A few tables are scattered around the room, spaced to provide privacy for the inn's patrons.

node.name: Houses Consulate, Rooftop Platform
node.description: From its northwest-facing position atop the consulate building, this precarious strip of rooftop space offers an especially stunning view of Shard's sky-piercing Great Tower, set dramatically against the turbulent thundercloud that rages above Stormwill Tower further in the distance. Sunlight reflecting off windows and crystalline spires adds a lucent shimmer to the sprawling cityscape below.

From its northwest-facing position atop the consulate building, this precarious strip of rooftop space offers an especially stunning view of Shard's sky-piercing Great Tower, set dramatically against the turbulent thundercloud that rages above Stormwill Tower further in the distance. Hundreds of glowing windows break the nighttime gloom below, speckling the cityscape with points of soft light.

node.name: Undershard, A Narrow Passage
node.description: Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable. A niche in the wall appears recently excavated with its contents spread on the floor.

node.name: Undershard, A Narrow Passage
node.description: Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable. Dampness seems to linger in the air, perhaps evaporation from the vent outside.

node.name: Undershard, A Narrow Passage
node.description: Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable. Passages off this central area provide access to the regions farther reaches.

node.name: Undershard, A Narrow Passage
node.description: Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable. These dark dirt walls emit a putrid scent that seems to coat anything that enters.

node.name: Undershard, A Narrow Passage
node.description: Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable. A bevy of spiders have constructed webs across the far corner of this space, making it cramped and inhospitable.

node.name: Undershard, A Narrow Passage
node.description: Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable. A stone column seems to emerge from the dirt walls in a spray of variegated color, probably a discard from some prior building.

node.name: Undershard, A Narrow Passage
node.description: Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable. The walls here look likely to crumble, and the faint scent of vinegar mingles with the dust.

node.name: Undershard, A Narrow Passage
node.description: Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable. The excavation here must have been done by a whirling dervish, because the walls and floor are extremely uneven making keeping one's balance difficult.

node.name: Undershard, A Narrow Passage
node.description: Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable. The atmosphere is almost suffocating, yet filled with tension that is almost palpable. A crude etching of a viper is centered on the right wall.

node.name: Undershard, A Narrow Passage
node.description: Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable. Overhead, fine dust sifts from tiny cracks in the ceiling indicating a subterranean creature may have opted to make it their residence.

node.name: Undershard, The Blasted Tunnel
node.description: This lengthy tunnel is narrow and confining, as if the miners were trying to sneak past what was above. The walls are full of chisel marks that give the space a texture which reflects light in odd patterns. Dry, heavy air -- a stark contrast to the moisture in the vent -- wafts through occasionally carrying different scents.

node.name: Undershard, The Blasted Tunnel
node.description: Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable. A few stray pebbles litter the ground decreasing the likelihood of avoiding detection.

node.name: Undershard, The Blasted Tunnel
node.description: Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable. Set off to the northeast side of the main tunnel, there is an open feeling to this space that belies its evil.

node.name: Undershard, The Blasted Tunnel
node.description: Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable. Air currents in here circulate in such a fashion that the echo mimics a low cackle every now and then.

node.name: Undershard, The Blasted Tunnel
node.description: The dirt walls in this space are striated in shades running from brown to pink. Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable.

node.name: Undershard, The Blasted Tunnel
node.description: Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable. The walls here look likely to crumble, and the faint scent of vinegar mingles with the dust.

node.name: Undershard, The Blasted Tunnel
node.description: Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable. A shiny spot on the floor encourages care lest one slip and crash into the wall or worse.

node.name: Undershard, The Blasted Tunnel
node.description: Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable. Some warped jokester has etched a caricature into the far wall.

node.name: Undershard, The Blasted Tunnel
node.description: Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable. This semi-circular space is narrow and confining, so much so it is difficult to turn around without bumping into the wall.

node.name: Undershard, The Blasted Tunnel
node.description: Each footfall announces the presence of anyone not exercising a modicum of stealth. Muffled sounds drift through the passageway, the location of their origin indeterminable. A chill fills the air here, as trapped air swirls in an attempt to find its way out.

node.name: Tower of Enchantment, Atrium
node.description: Built in circular splendor, the Enchanting Hall is designed to make the narrow building seem much larger on the inside than it appears from the outside. Opposite of a crystalline archway, a spiral ramp winds its way up the tower, breaking only to allow access to each level. A stream of water falls from the magnificent domed glass ceiling, filling a shallow pool in the center of the room that gives sanctuary to a multitude of brightly colored fish.

node.name: Tower of Enchantment, Society Master's Office
node.description: Thick, plush red carpet reaches from one goldenrod-colored wall to the next, bathing the room in posh elegance. Sturdy, lacquered bookshelves line the room, displaying numerous titles for the discerning reader. A silk-clad Elothean librarian sits at a nearby desk, gazing down through her spectacles at a book in her hand.

node.name: Tower of Enchantment, Tool Store
node.description: Uneven and sporadically spaced floorboards give a glimpse of the lower level as it wraps around the tower to form a charmingly quirky balcony. Dozens of gaethzen fireflies are placed just out of reach, illuminating the space while adding to the whimsical oddness of the tower. Attendants bustle around the shop as they pull down tools, restock, and wait upon customers.

node.name: Tower of Enchantment, Supply Store
node.description: Numerous planters line the walls of the translucent-floored tier, many of them blossoming with flowers. Daisies and daffodils lend a splash of yellow, while dozens of tulips dazzle in shades of deep red and pink. Clerks mill about behind a curvy counter, tidying up and restocking supplies.

node.name: Tower of Enchantment, Book Store
node.description: Swirls of copper, silver, and gold shimmer within the thick glass floor, distorting the view of the lower level. Filled with an assortment of books and scrolls, glass shelves line the circular walls of the room. Clerks bustle about as they attend to the needs of the waiting customers.

node.name: Tower of Enchantment, Ascendant Tier
node.description: Encircling a mosaic medallion embedded into the thick glass floor are thirteen bronze triptychs, each of them turned to reveal their neutral aspect. The eyes of the neutral gods stare blankly at mosaic in the center of the room.

node.name: Tower of Enchantment, Transcendent Tier
node.description: Set into a thick glass floor are a plethora of esoteric gold and silver sigils, each elaborate in their simplicity, yet too complex to define. Several pewter pedestals holding mirrored bowls are placed about the area in a seemingly haphazard manner.

node.name: Tower of Enchantment, Copper Workroom
node.description: Fairly spacious, the workroom is set up in an ideal fashion for working with enchantments. Several gaethzen orbs in the ceiling allow enough light to work by, aided by crystal lanterns that hang near each corner. The room is relatively quiet, tucked away from the hustle and bustle of the rest of the tower.

node.name: Tower of Enchantment, Bronze Workroom
node.description: Fairly spacious, the workroom is set up in an ideal fashion for working with enchantments. Several gaethzen orbs in the ceiling allow enough light to work by, aided by crystal lanterns that hang near each corner. The room is relatively quiet, tucked away from the hustle and bustle of the rest of the tower.

node.name: Tower of Enchantment, Pewter Workroom
node.description: Fairly spacious, the workroom is set up in an ideal fashion for working with enchantments. Several gaethzen orbs in the ceiling allow enough light to work by, aided by crystal lanterns that hang near each corner. The room is relatively quiet, tucked away from the hustle and bustle of the rest of the tower.

node.name: Tower of Enchantment, Silver Workroom
node.description: Fairly spacious, the workroom is set up in an ideal fashion for working with enchantments. Several gaethzen orbs in the ceiling allow enough light to work by, aided by crystal lanterns that hang near each corner. The room is relatively quiet, tucked away from the hustle and bustle of the rest of the tower.

node.name: Tower of Enchantment, Gold Workroom
node.description: Fairly spacious, the workroom is set up in an ideal fashion for working with enchantments. Several gaethzen orbs in the ceiling allow enough light to work by, aided by crystal lanterns that hang near each corner. The room is relatively quiet, tucked away from the hustle and bustle of the rest of the tower.

node.name: Tower of Enchantment, Platinum Workroom
node.description: Fairly spacious, the workroom is set up in an ideal fashion for working with enchantments. Several gaethzen orbs in the ceiling allow enough light to work by, aided by crystal lanterns that hang near each corner. The room is relatively quiet, tucked away from the hustle and bustle of the rest of the tower.

node.name: House of the Grey Storm, Entrance Garden
node.description: Massive wrought-iron gates mark the only break in the walls of polished marble that enclose this meticulously manicured compound. Statuesque tiger lilies rise in neat rows from mounds of grey-green foliage to either side of the slate walkway. Silk pennants line the path, each lit by its own gaethzen orb. To the northeast, two large stone towers flank a series of small gardens.

node.name: House of the Grey Storm, Garden of Heroes
node.description: Standing astride platforms of charcoal basalt, a row of solemn bronze statues rings this circular garden. White chrysanthemums cascade from large stone urns between the figures, and a formal planting in the center of the area pairs irises with a solitary gnarled cherry tree. To the north, a graceful lacquered footbridge leads across a crescent-shaped pool while an archway leads into the eastern tower.

node.name: House of the Grey Storm, Western Tower Entryway
node.description: Open and airy, grey marble forms the entire massive structure, even up to the frescoed ceiling. Glass windows with heavy red velvet curtains pulled aside provide an expansive view of the exterior gardens. High-backed chairs of ornately carved blackwood are placed to one side for the comfort of guests not escorted beyond the spiraling stairway.

node.name: House of the Grey Storm, Dining Hall
node.description: Low, round tables of highly polished blackwood are scattered over the heavy woven rug underfoot. Bright candelabra fill the room with light reflected from pale yellow crystal, lending it a mellow ambience absent from the rest of the austere towers. Sideboards heaped with food are placed against a marble wall near the entrance, refilled at all hours for those mages who would burn the midnight oil.

node.name: House of the Grey Storm, Kitchen
node.description: Holding enough cookware and supplies for all the residents of the tower and their guests, a floor-to-ceiling cupboards are almost continually open. A hearth, large enough to roast an entire steer, graces the middle of the western wall. Flanking it on both sides are massive iron stoves. Chattering cooks and errand boys weave a complex dance around the many cabinets filled with foodstuffs and racks of wine.

node.name: House of the Grey Storm, Eastern Tower
node.description: Almost perfectly round, the hall features a massive stairway that spirals upwards, hugging the marble wall. Windows provide light and a pleasant view of the gardens. A cobblestone fireplace flanked by tapestries stands before a set of plush armchairs.

node.name: House of the Grey Storm, Hall
node.description: Heavy rugs underfoot muffle the sound of footfalls on the stone floor. A tall goldbark vase holding a large arrangement of tiger lilies is the only adornment here, though the scent of ozone hangs thickly on the air.

node.name: House of the Grey Storm, Meeting Hall
node.description: Rows of stone benches covered with thin grey velvet cushions surround a raised dais in the center of the simply furnished hall. Curving steps lead downward to the rest of the tower, and a heavy door set with leaded glass leads onto the sky bridge connecting the two towers. Overhead is a ceiling of swirled glass in bold colors.

node.name: House of the Grey Storm, Sky Bridge
node.description: Black and grey slate tiles stretch across the bridge that ties the two towers together in an elaborate knotwork mosaic. The pattern is accented by the tiny, almost translucent, white flowers that grow between each square. Pale morning glories cling to the balustrade of polished marble that encloses the area. At its center rises an obelisk surrounded by delicate, pearlescent orchids.

node.name: House of the Grey Storm, Hallway
node.description: A carved blackwood chair sits at the end of the hall, the long leaves of a tall fern plant partly draping over its high back. A narrow window allows for a view of the Great Tower, standing majestically in the center of the cityscape. A black door leads to a guest bedroom, and a thick door set with leaded glass leads out to the sky bridge connecting the two towers.

node.name: House of the Grey Storm, Hallway
node.description: Faint scorch marks mar the grey slate floor here, perhaps from some impromptu duel gone wrong. Long swags of charcoal-hued Elothean silk hang from the high ceiling to flank a carved obsidian flame fountain, across from which is a lacquered door.

node.name: House of the Grey Storm, Lounge
node.description: Loosely clustered around an elaborately carved fireplace are crushed velvet couches in rich sapphire tones, each set with pale grey pillows of raw Elothean silk. A loosely woven rug softens the sound of footfall, narrows strips of gold gossamer giving reflected light the appearance of flame when a fire blazes in the hearth. Glass windows provide both a view of the immaculate gardens below and the city of Shard.

node.name: House of the Grey Storm, Guest Room
node.description: Two overstuffed leather chairs sit beneath the narrow window of this comfortably appointed room. A black lacquered four-poster bed sits beside a matching nightstand holding a cluster of white beeswax pillar candles. A luxurious panther fur rug partly covers the ebony floor, its limbs spread wide before a small bronze brazier. Exotic jeweled masks add a touch of color and mystery to the room.

node.name: House of the Grey Storm, Dormitory
node.description: Simple wooden cots, each with a smooth velvet coverlet, line the wall. Heavy chests with the house crest carved on the lids are placed at the foot of every bed beneath a small table adorned with a bronze oil lamp. Many mages find solace here after long hours of practice and study before striking out on their own or moving into one of the apartments higher in the tower.

node.name: Shard, Item Registration Office
node.description: Different paintings depicting the Great Tower in different styles adorn almost every inch of open wall space. Rows of large metal cabinets line the wall behind a high counter that separates the clerks from the general public. The spotless red tile floor shines as if it had been polished just moments ago.

node.name: Shard, Registrar's Office
node.description: A large metal desk sits in the exact center of the office. Lined up around the walls are more large metal cabinets, half of them open with hundreds of papers hanging out as if in middle of processing.

node.name: Shard, Carousel Family Services
node.description: A series of guarded arches line the southern wall. The complicated framework of iron and timbers spans across the ceiling. Countless gears, pulleys and weights form the strikingly complex mechanism which drives the Carousel.

node.name: Serene Surfaces
node.description: Cleverly placed mirrors hung on the white paneled walls create the illusion the small shop is larger than it is, allowing patrons to not feel overcrowded while browsing its wares. A dark blue rug serves to accent the assortment of tables arranged along the walls and center space of the room, their shapes and sizes ranging from tall and narrow to short and round.

node.name: Shard Meeting Tower, Entrance
node.description: Though relatively small compared to the other towers in Shard, the meeting tower is quite sturdily built and perfectly circular. The rather low ceiling of the landing level is made from polished cedar wood, and its floor is a lustrous white marble. The long hallway bisects the tower past stone walls, a narrow ramp leading upward to the other levels.

node.name: Hall of the Moons
node.description: Shaped into a nearly perfect semi-circle, the wide room is lit by braziers burning on the ends of tall silver poles. Emblazoned onto the curving walls is a continuous mural of the nighttime sky, with all three moons shown in conjunction with each other. Comfortable chairs are scattered throughout the room, and a few red curtains partially shroud a few small windows.

node.name: Hall of the Hunt
node.description: Shaped into a nearly perfect semi-circle, the wide room is lit by braziers burning on the ends of tall silver poles. Emblazoned onto the curving walls is a continuous mural of a dense forest, with several deer hidden in among the trees. Comfortable chairs are scattered throughout the room, and a few green curtains partially shroud a few small windows that look out onto the street.

node.name: Shard Meeting Tower, Second Landing
node.description: Small windows on each end of the hallway look out just above the rooftops of the city, and the Crystal Tower is visible from the eastern window. Tall pillars stand at even intervals through the short hallway. A narrow red carpet runs the length of the hall, leading to ramps that lead up or down respectively, each one hugging the edge of the outer wall.

node.name: Hall of Storms
node.description: Shaped into a nearly perfect semi-circle, the wide room is lit by braziers burning on the ends of tall silver poles. Emblazoned onto the curving walls is a continuous mural of a raging storm, with jagged forks of lightning striking at the floor. Comfortable chairs are scattered throughout the room, and a wide window looks out on Stormwill Tower to the north.

node.name: Hall of Crystal
node.description: Shaped into a nearly perfect semi-circle, the wide room is lit by braziers burning on the ends of tall silver poles. Set into the curving walls are numerous semi-precious gems and crystals, creating a scintillating pattern of color that suffuses throughout the room. Comfortable chairs are scattered throughout the room, and a few white curtains partially shroud a few small windows.

node.name: Shard Meeting Tower, Third Landing
node.description: Thin sheets of dark shale line the lower half of the pale walls, creating a mosaic effect that vaguely resembles the skyline of Shard. Gold veins pierce the white marble that covers the floor, forming a shimmering spiderweb effect. A ramp slopes downward, leading back to the second landing.

node.name: Hall of the Gods
node.description: Shaped into a nearly perfect circle, the large room is lit by braziers burning on the ends of tall silver poles. Emblazoned onto the curving walls is a continuous mural showing numerous avatars of the gods, each rendered in exacting detail. Comfortable chairs and couches are scattered throughout the room, and a wide window looks out on the Tower of Honor to the south.

node.name: Shard Meeting Tower, Rooftop Balcony
node.description: Open to the air, the perfectly round balcony is surrounded by a three-foot wall that has an alternating brick pattern at the top. Low benches are set in even intervals along the rooftop, giving a place to sit. Wyvern Mountain is visible past the walls of the city to the west, and the entirety of the Crystal Tower rises to the east.

node.name: Moon Mage Guild, Seers' Study
node.description: The skylights above curve down to form the exterior wall of this wedge-shaped chamber, offering a breathtaking view of the western half of the city and Wyvern Mountain beyond. One interior wall is lined with sturdy bookcases, while the other features a large cork board next to a desk stocked with paper and writing implements. A complicated web-patterned mosaic on the floor converges on a black marble lectern near the crystal wall.

node.name: Shard Forging Society, Bulk Materials
node.description: The sounds of the nearby forges are muted in this roofed, open space. Countless traders and wagons are efficiently directed through a loop from Xibar's Crescent Road, through a processing area where their wagons are unloaded and reloaded, and then back out onto the streets once again. Clerks dash about with their paperwork to keep the assembly flowing, though one remains at a counter to take orders. From time to time, the heat and soot from within the society proper are swirled through on a breeze.

node.name: Crimson Crane Couriers, Printing Room
node.description: Precious little floor space exists in this cramped but well-kept showroom. Heavily laden supply shelves line each wall, and various presses, cutters, and paper milling machines dominate the crowded area behind the service counter, where an apron-clad Elothean clerk waits to consult with potential customers.

node.name: Crimson Crane Couriers, Special Collections
node.description: Appointed with comfortable brocade sofas and highly polished display cabinetry, the print shop's rear salon serves as quiet consultation space. Two large ink-and-watercolor paintings complement the fine furnishings from prominent positions on the wainscoted wall that faces the doorway.

node.name: Shard, Carousel Square
node.description: A massive conical building rises from the cobbles at the square's center, its snowy alabaster surfaces gleaming brilliantly against the drab backdrop of the surrounding stone and wood. A bejeweled mosaic set above an oval doorway reads "THE CAROUSEL."

node.name: Shard, Rundmolen Post Office
node.description: Tucked away in a corner of the square is a long alabaster counter set into the conical carousel beneath a colorful striped awning. Wide yellow stripes contrast with deep crimson alternating bands across the sturdy canvas while bright blue tassels hang from the corners. Vast, countless rows of differently sized shelves are behind the counter, and complex Dwarven mechanisms can be heard as they rearrange the package-covered storage. Clerks shuffle endlessly back and forth between the counters and shelving as they assist patrons with their packaging and mailing needs.

node.name: Shard Housing Office, Entry
node.description: Designed to be functional and efficient, there's little in the way of decoration or frills to be found. The walls are cleanly painted a light, calming shade of blue while the floor is tiled with alternating squares of white and black. Desks, each manned by a single Dwarven clerk, lie on either side of the open space.

node.name: Shard Housing Office, Prospective Buyers
node.description: A shallow dish holds three candles, each a different thickness and height and only one of which is burning. The clerk seated behind the desk meticulously checks and re-checks figures in a large tome. From time to time, the clerk looks up and waves an eager patron closer to sort their paperwork before efficiently sending them on their way.

node.name: Shard Housing Office, Transfers
node.description: A small, potted cactus consisting of several prickly knobs growing off of one another is the only decoration to be seen here. Otherwise, the desk is neatly organized with stacks of parchments, a feathered quill resting in a half-filled inkwell, and a heavy tome of records that the clerk casually pages through.

node.name: Wharf End, Mer'Kresh
node.description: Through the gaps in the heavy wood planks, one can easily see the waters of Torbis Sanhalas lapping noisily at the pilings. Although most of the surface of the wharf is covered by a wide assortment of boxes, barrels and shipping goods, there is little that would stop a dropped coin or trinket from vanishing through the slats and sinking into a watery grave.
